uk.co.senab.bitmapcache

Class BitmapLruCache.Builder

  • java.lang.Object
    • uk.co.senab.bitmapcache.BitmapLruCache.Builder
  • Enclosing class:
    BitmapLruCache

    public static final class BitmapLruCache.Builder
extends java.lang.Object
    Builder class for {link BitmapLruCache. An example call: 
     BitmapLruCache.Builder builder = new BitmapLruCache.Builder();
 builder.setMemoryCacheEnabled(true).setMemoryCacheMaxSizeUsingHeapSize(this);
 builder.setDiskCacheEnabled(true).setDiskCacheLocation(...);

 BitmapLruCache cache = builder.build();

      Deprecated. 
      You should now use Builder(Context). This is so that we can reliably set up correctly.

      • setMemoryCacheMaxSizeUsingHeapSize

        public BitmapLruCache.Builder setMemoryCacheMaxSizeUsingHeapSize(float percentageOfHeap)
        Sets the Memory Cache maximum size to be the given percentage of heap size. This is capped at % of the app heap size.
        Parameters:
        percentageOfHeap - - percentage of heap size. Valid values are 0.0 <= x <= .
        Returns:
        This Builder object to allow for chaining of calls to set methods.

      • setRecyclePolicy

        public BitmapLruCache.Builder setRecyclePolicy(BitmapLruCache.RecyclePolicy recyclePolicy)
        Sets the recycle policy. This controls if Bitmap.recycle() is called.
        Parameters:
        recyclePolicy - - New recycle policy, can not be null.
        Returns:
        This Builder object to allow for chaining of calls to set methods.
